# Yi Pune Website - Project Instructions

This is a modern, responsive website for Young Indians (Yi) Pune Chapter.

## Project Type
Static website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

## Design System
- **Colors**: Yellow (#FDB714), White (#FFFFFF), Black (#000000), Grey (#F5F5F5, #333333)
- **Typography**: Inter/Roboto font families
- **Layout**: Full-width layouts with consistent spacing
- **Design Style**: Clean, modern, energetic youth-driven look

## Pages Structure
1. Home
2. About Us (Who We Are, Leadership, Our Journey)
3. Verticals & Initiatives (8 vertical pages)
4. Events (Upcoming + Past)
5. Membership
6. Yi Yuva
7. Impact & Stories
8. Media & Gallery
9. Partners & Collaborations
10. Blog / Insights
11. Contact Us
12. Global Footer

## Technical Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3 (with custom properties for design tokens)
- Vanilla JavaScript
- Responsive design (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
- No external frameworks initially

## Development Guidelines
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Semantic HTML
- Accessible components
- Optimized performance
- Reusable components
